Laura Marie Davis

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Marie Davis
  2. Foster Name: Margaret ([Peggy])

  4. Location of Family: Gresham, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Osceola, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 2
  8. Date of Birth:
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Margaret Kidder
  11. Spouse Name: William Kidder
